column4: does anyone hear run firefox or openoffice in a language other than english
how do you get the locale to display in your language? (after downloading the appropriate lang packages)
i installed the firefox and OO french packages but dunno how to get them to display french!
for firefox you have to go in the preference panel
I don't remember how I did
so the character encoding thing won't change the lang in the menus then?
do you run your firefox with other options? ie. /usr/bin/firefox lang=fr_FR or something like that?
IIRC it's just for the langage displayed in the User-agent
so i guess you are using the french pack lol ;)
